BadgeDetail.Name: Revise
BadgeDetail.Description: A framework for entry-level web literacy & 21st Century skills. Write - Revise: Systematically reviewing and examining digital content with the intent of improving work process and product.

Task.Title: CSS Fonts
Task.Body: You will use webfonts to create moods and tones on webpages, learning about revising, searching, coding, composing, designing, and remixing.TaskClick the "Remix" button. This will open Thimble. You'll see a range of custom fonts we used to get you started.Follow the steps in the tutorial. The tutorial will walk you through how to make changes to the code.Done! Once you're finished, you can save your work and share it. Log in and hit "Publish".EvidenceShare a link to your remixed Webfonts webpage or take a screenshot of your creation!21C Skills: CommunicationProblem-SolvingCreativity
Task.HtmlBody:
You will use webfonts to create moods and tones on webpages, learning about revising, searching, coding, composing, designing, and remixing.

Task
  • Click the "Remix" button. This will open Thimble. You'll see a range of custom fonts we used to get you started.
  • Follow the steps in the tutorial. The tutorial will walk you through how to make changes to the code.
  • Done! Once you're finished, you can save your work and share it. Log in and hit "Publish".

Evidence

Share a link to your remixed Webfonts webpage or take a screenshot of your creation!

21C Skills:

  • Communication
  • Problem-Solving
  • Creativity
Task.TextileBody:
You will use webfonts to create moods and tones on webpages, learning about *revising, searching, coding, composing, designing, and remixing.*

*Task*
* Click the "["Remix":https://d157rqmxrxj6ey.cloudfront.net/chadsansing/20997/]" button. This will open Thimble. You'll see a range of custom fonts we used to get you started.
* Follow the steps in the tutorial. The tutorial will walk you through how to make changes to the code.
* Done! Once you're finished, you can save your work and share it. Log in and hit "Publish".

*Evidence*

Share a link to your remixed *Webfonts webpage* or take a screenshot of your creation!

*21C Skills:* 

* ["Communication":https://learning.mozilla.org/web-literacy/skills/#communication]
* ["Problem-Solving":https://learning.mozilla.org/web-literacy/skills/#problem-solving]
* ["Creativity":https://learning.mozilla.org/web-literacy/skills/#creativity]

Task.Title: CSS Fonts Extension: Bridge to Infinity
Task.Body: Jump right into this Thimble project to improve the fonts on this remix-able movie poster, learning about revising, coding, composing, and design.TaskClick the "Remix" button. This will open Thimble. You'll see a movie poster with a range of illegible fonts.Follow the steps in the tutorial. The tutorial will walk you through how to make changes to the code.Done! Once you're finished, you can save your work and share it. Log in and hit "Publish".EvidenceShare a link to your redesigned movie poster or take a screenshot of your creation!21C Skills: CommunicationProblem-SolvingCreativity
Task.HtmlBody:
Jump right into this Thimble project to improve the fonts on this remix-able movie poster, learning about revising, coding, composing, and design.

Task
  • Click the "Remix" button. This will open Thimble. You'll see a movie poster with a range of illegible fonts.
  • Follow the steps in the tutorial. The tutorial will walk you through how to make changes to the code.
  • Done! Once you're finished, you can save your work and share it. Log in and hit "Publish".

Evidence

Share a link to your redesigned movie poster or take a screenshot of your creation!

21C Skills:

  • Communication
  • Problem-Solving
  • Creativity
Task.TextileBody:
Jump right into this Thimble project to improve the fonts on this remix-able movie poster, learning about *revising, coding, composing, and design.*

*Task*
* Click the "["Remix":https://d157rqmxrxj6ey.cloudfront.net/chadsansing/22265/]" button. This will open Thimble. You'll see a movie poster with a range of illegible fonts.
* Follow the steps in the tutorial. The tutorial will walk you through how to make changes to the code.
* Done! Once you're finished, you can save your work and share it. Log in and hit "Publish".

Share a link to your *redesigned movie poster* or take a screenshot of your creation!

Task.Title: CSS Decoration
Task.Body: You will apply text- and box-effect CSS styling techniques to inline and block elements on an HTML webpage, learning about revising, coding, composing, and designing.TaskClick the "Remix" button. This will open Thimble. You'll see some CSS that has been used to edit and create effects across a webpage.Follow the steps in the tutorial. The tutorial will walk you through how to make changes to the code.Done! Once you're finished, you can save your work and share it. Log in and hit "Publish".EvidenceShare a link to your remixed Style sheet or take a screenshot of your creation!21C Skills: CommunicationProblem-SolvingCreativity
Task.HtmlBody:
You will apply text- and box-effect CSS styling techniques to inline and block elements on an HTML webpage, learning about revising, coding, composing, and designing.

Task
  • Click the "Remix" button. This will open Thimble. You'll see some CSS that has been used to edit and create effects across a webpage.
  • Follow the steps in the tutorial. The tutorial will walk you through how to make changes to the code.
  • Done! Once you're finished, you can save your work and share it. Log in and hit "Publish".

Evidence

Share a link to your remixed Style sheet or take a screenshot of your creation!

21C Skills:

  • Communication
  • Problem-Solving
  • Creativity
Task.TextileBody:
You will apply text- and box-effect CSS styling techniques to inline and block elements on an HTML webpage, learning about *revising, coding, composing, and designing.*

*Task*
* Click the "["Remix":https://d157rqmxrxj6ey.cloudfront.net/chadsansing/21556"]" button. This will open Thimble. You'll see some CSS that has been used to edit and create effects across a webpage.
* Follow the steps in the tutorial. The tutorial will walk you through how to make changes to the code.
* Done! Once you're finished, you can save your work and share it. Log in and hit "Publish".

*Evidence*

Share a link to your remixed *Style sheet* or take a screenshot of your creation!
